name: Mlearning Trends
short_description: The mobile revolution is being driven by a new generation of users who want to be mobile and want to be connected to information when they need it instead of trying to store information in their heads for later use. This inquiry is about how this difference in the approach to knowledge affects workplace learning and performance. Five internet sources were reviewed and revealed similar facts and assumptions about the increasing use worldwide of mobile applications for workplace learning and performance management.
summary: review of mobile learning trends in workplace
